d1e3.t: How do I use Google Bard?
d1e3.d: Google Bard, like ChatGPT, accepts input questions from you and generates full-text responses.

d1e10.d: Generative AI reads models containing structured data generates conversational summaries, images, and suggestions.

d1e17.d: Sometimes the best way to learn about the capabilities of a tool is to test it out with sample questions.

d1e24.d: Google Bard is as a public, generative AI tool that allows you to get full-text, conversational responses to your questions.
